attributes.additional_details:
Watch Panama 
I have adopted an ex breeding bitch they grow up with flat feet as they are walking on their own faeces they have no spark in their eye they are frightened of everyrhing and atm rive with a multitude of health concerns due to neglect and interbreeding HELP THE ONES WITHOUT A VOICE
attributes.background: We are all aware how dogs are being bred with a license on puppy farms using cruel intensive farming methods it is 2016 do we as a nation want to be part of this someone must stand up for these dogs without a voice let it be us.PUPPY FARMING MUST STOP
